title: Bug 36679BIDI: PopupList can't be created with explicitly assigned orientation.
description: Bug 36679BIDI: PopupList can't be created with explicitly assigned orientation.
OB: Currently it is impossible to create Shell and List widgets of PopupList withexplicitly assigned orientation. As result, PopupList always has orientation oftop Shell.
EB: It isn't desirable if, for example, table, which use PopupList forediting of it's cells, has orientation, that is differ from orientation of topShell.
